pages.text: You'll probably notice that your vision is much less saturated when you become a vampire - this is because you don't have enough blood.
As a vampire, you don't need food any more - your hunger bar is now a blood bar.

You can gain blood by feeding from mobs with shift+right click - more 'human-like' mobs give better blood. You can feed as often as you like before you get to blood level four, but after that you can only feed once every quarter day. Be careful feeding from villagers - if they're awake and notice you, they won't be very happy!
You can use Vampire Blood Injectors and Empty Vampire Blood Injectors to give yourself (or take away) blood any time.
